title: Reattaching to work is just as important as detaching from work, study finds

title_detail.value: Reattaching to work is just as important as detaching from work, study finds

summary: Employees who mentally reattach to work in the morning are more engaged at work, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Employees who mentally reattach to work in the morning are more engaged at work, according to a new study.
